content:
hey there Im quite new to rust
Im helping darkfi project with the theming of their mdbook, I have read documentation and clone repository with default html/css/js files. Could anyone give me some tips on how would one go about setting a diferent default theme on mdbooks? Cheers Irelativis
specifically my question is to costumize you mdbook are you supposed to replace "{{ language }}">for "en" instance? or .hbs are ment to be left like that? given those are just place holders? etc
ok I now understanf the .hbs format has a template
